en: He sometimes makes me feel strange when we meet each other face to face.
zh: 他有时候面对面地和我见面时，会让我觉得很奇怪。

en: He flunked his driving test three times.
zh: 他考了三次驾照都没通过。

en: He's going from strength to strength.
He is extremely strong.
He seldom comes to see me.
He seldom goes to church.
He rarely goes to church.
He hardly ever opens a book.
He seldom gets angry or irritated.
He rarely goes to the movies.
He is a cheerful young man.
He has a keen awareness of the problem.
zh: 他对这个问题有敏锐的认识。

en: He made a speech in plain English.
zh: 他用简单的英语发表了演讲。

en: I believe he is coming tomorrow.
Will he come tomorrow?
He will come tomorrow.
He will be busy tomorrow.
He will play baseball tomorrow.
He'll leave by plane tomorrow.
He is flying to Paris tomorrow.
This morning he said that he is leaving for Nara tomorrow.
zh: 今天早上他说他明天要出发去奈良。

en: This morning he said that he would be leaving for Nara tomorrow.
zh: 今天早上他说他明天要出发去奈良。

en: He leaves for Tokyo tomorrow.
He's leaving for Tokyo tomorrow.
He'll leave for Tokyo tomorrow.
He will set out for China tomorrow.
He will go to Tokyo tomorrow, won't he?
He is due to arrive tomorrow.
He will have to help his mother in the kitchen tomorrow.
zh: 他明天得在厨房帮他妈妈的忙。

en: He will have to get up early tomorrow.
He is scheduled to come up to Tokyo tomorrow.
He is to start tomorrow.
He is going to start tomorrow.
Will he call on me tomorrow?
He will call on me tomorrow.
He will arrive in Kyoto tomorrow.
He will not be back tomorrow.
He will be back tomorrow.
He is going to go to school tomorrow.
He parted from me saying that he would see me the next day, but I have not heard from him since.
zh: 他离开我的时候说第二天会来看我，但我之后就再也没收到他的消息。

en: He will be free tomorrow.
He will be able to hand in his report tomorrow.
He comes home from his trip to Europe tomorrow.
zh: 他明天结束欧洲旅行回家。

en: He will have done his homework by tomorrow.
zh: 到明天他就会做完作业了。

en: He will end the work by tomorrow.
zh: 他明天会结束这项工作。

en: He'll probably finish the work by tomorrow.
zh: 他大概明天会完成这项工作。

en: He'll finish the job by tomorrow.
zh: 他明天会完成这项工作。

en: He is leaving for Peru tomorrow, isn't he?
zh: 他明天要出发去秘鲁，是吧？

en: He probably won't go on the picnic tomorrow. I won't either.
zh: 他可能明天不会去野餐。我也不去。

en: He will be at home tomorrow.
He will arrive in Paris tomorrow.
He sent me a letter saying that he'd arrive at ten tomorrow morning.
zh: 他给我寄了一封信，说他明天早上十点到达。

en: He will be in London at this time tomorrow.
zh: 明天这个时候他会在伦敦。

en: He'll be in London about this time tomorrow.
zh: 明天这个时候他大概会在伦敦。

en: He will be talking with his family at this time tomorrow.
zh: 明天这个时候他会和家人聊天。

en: He is going to leave tomorrow afternoon.
He will be playing tennis tomorrow afternoon.
He may come tomorrow afternoon.
He is coming to see me tomorrow afternoon.
He will be having dinner with her at this time tomorrow.
zh: 明天这个时候他会和她一起吃晚饭。

en: I expect him to come along any day now.
zh: 我希望他最近几天会来。

en: He will play tennis tomorrow.
He will come to you tomorrow.
He must go there tomorrow.
He will play soccer tomorrow.
He will leave here tomorrow.
I'm sure he will come tomorrow.
He'll be busy tomorrow.
He began his lecture with the Meiji Restoration.
zh: 他以明治维新开始了他的讲座。

en: He will reach Kyoto the day after tomorrow.
He is a cheerful boy.
He went home while it was still light.
zh: 天还亮着的时候他就回家了。

en: He is admittedly an able leader.
zh: 他确实是一位有能力的领导者。

en: He is without doubt one of the most successful businessmen in Japan.
zh: 毫无疑问，他是日本最成功的商人之一。

en: He was clearly embarrassed.
He is above suspicion.
He turned off the light and he went to bed.
zh: 他关了灯，然后就上床睡觉了。

en: He saved the child at the risk of his own life.
zh: 他冒着生命危险救了那个孩子。

en: He rescued the dog at the risk of his own life.
zh: 他冒着生命危险救了那只狗。

en: He saved her at the risk of his life.
zh: 他冒着生命危险救了她。

en: He saved the child at the risk of his life.
zh: 他冒着生命危险救了那个孩子。

en: His life is in danger.
He ran away for his life.
He ran away for dear life.
He was born into a noble family.
zh: 他出生于一个贵族家庭。

en: He is prime minister in name, but not in reality.
zh: 他只是名义上的首相，实际上并非如此。

en: He is just a Mr Nobody.
He was almost asleep when he heard his name called.
zh: 他快要睡着的时候，听到了有人叫他的名字。

en: He is weak on names.
He has a hard time remembering names.
He's not good at remembering names.
He has trouble remembering names.
He was gray, like his name.
zh: 他的脸色灰白，就像他的名字一样。

en: He is a scholar by name, not in fact.
zh: 他只是个有名无实的学者。

en: He is eager for fame.
He was anxious for fame.
He was desperate to defend his reputation.
zh: 他拼命地维护自己的名誉。

en: He is thirsty for fame.
He sought for his name.
He was not anxious for fame.
He associates only with prestigious people.
zh: 他只和有地位的人交往。

en: He seeks fame and wealth.
He is said to be a good doctor.
He presented his card.
He is the president in name only.
zh: 他只是个有名无实的总统。

en: He is a good doctor.
He married his daughter to a lawyer.
zh: 他把女儿嫁给了一个律师。

en: He argued his daughter out of marrying Tom.
zh: 他说服女儿不要嫁给汤姆。

en: He convinced his daughter to not marry Tom.
zh: 他说服女儿不要嫁给汤姆。

en: He convinced his daughter not to marry Tom.
zh: 他说服女儿不要嫁给汤姆。

en: He talked his daughter out of marrying Tom.
zh: 他说服女儿不要嫁给汤姆。

en: He has married his daughter to a young lawyer.
zh: 他把女儿嫁给了一个年轻的律师。

en: He introduced his daughter to me.
zh: 他把女儿介绍给我认识。

en: He married his daughter to a bank clerk.
zh: 他把女儿嫁给了一个银行职员。

en: He married his daughter to a rich man.
zh: 他把女儿嫁给了一个有钱人。

en: He loves his daughter, but his wife doesn't.
zh: 他爱他的女儿，但他妻子不爱。

en: Every month, he saved ten thousand yen out of his income for his daughter.
zh: 每个月，他从收入中为女儿存一万日元。

en: He took offense at his daughter's behavior.
zh: 他对女儿的行为感到生气。

en: He did not consent to his daughter's marriage.
He kissed his daughter on the forehead.
He was angry with his daughter.
He left his daughter a great fortune.
zh: 他给女儿留下了一大笔财产。

en: He bought his daughter a new dress.
zh: 他给女儿买了一条新裙子。

en: He sent fruit and vegetables to his daughter.
zh: 他给女儿送了水果和蔬菜。

en: He sent fruits and vegetables to his daughter.
zh: 他给女儿送了水果和蔬菜。

en: He bought his daughter a dress.
zh: 他给他女儿买了条裙子。

en: He gave his daughter quite a lot of money.
He was shocked to hear that his daughter had shoplifted.
zh: 他听到他女儿行窃的消息感到震惊。

en: He broke down completely on hearing of his daughter's death.
zh: 听到他女儿去世的消息，他彻底崩溃了。

en: The mist prevented him from seeing very far.
He isn't consistent with himself.
He apologized for his rudeness.
He dared to doubt my sincerity.
He made a rude reply.
He was impolite, not to say rude.
zh: 他是不礼貌，简直是粗鲁。

en: He forced her to sit down.
He was coerced into helping the thieves.
He made me sign the paper against my will.
zh: 他违背我的意愿让我签了字。

en: He was forced to work overtime.
He compelled me to make a speech.
He was made to do it against his will.
zh: 他被迫违背自己的意愿做了这件事。

en: He made me go against my will.
zh: 他违背我的意愿让我去了。

en: He was forced to buy stocks.
He gets a kick out of reckless driving.
He pretended ignorance, which made me still more angry.
zh: 他假装无知，这让我更加生气。

en: Besides being ignorant, he is too proud.
zh: 他不仅无知，而且还很骄傲。

en: He was absent without leave.
He used her bike without asking permission.
zh: 他未经允许就用了她的自行车。

en: He quit without notice.
zh: 他没有事先通知就辞职了。

en: He has not failed for nothing.
He heartlessly deserted his wife.
zh: 他狠心地抛弃了他的妻子。

en: He ran as a candidate, independent of any party.
zh: 他以独立候选人的身份参选，不属于任何党派。

en: He put on an air of innocence.
zh: 他装出一副无辜的样子。

en: He is under a false accusation.
He declared that he was innocent.
It is believed that he was innocent.
I bet my bottom dollar he is innocent.
He returned home safely, which pleased his parents.
zh: 他安全地回到了家，这让他的父母很高兴。

en: I believe that he is innocent.
He is a man to be reckoned with.
zh: 他是一个不可小觑的人物。

en: He came home safe.
He arrived safely.
He has rough manners.
He apologized for his rudeness, but she wouldn't forgive him.
zh: 他为自己的粗鲁道歉，但她不肯原谅他。

en: He is rude, but I love him all the same.
zh: 他很粗鲁，但我仍然爱他。

en: He was acquitted.
He must be innocent.
There's no doubt that he's innocent.
He is generally believed to have been innocent.
zh: 人们普遍认为他是无辜的。

en: He said he was innocent, but all the same we believed he was guilty.
zh: 他说他是无辜的，但尽管如此，我们还是认为他有罪。

en: It is generally believed that he was innocent.
zh: 人们普遍认为他是无辜的。

en: He is a silent, manly boy.
zh: 他是一个沉默寡言，有男子气概的男孩。

en: He is as poor as a rat.
He is a rude person.
He is reticent and he never speaks unless spoken to.
zh: 他沉默寡言，除非别人跟他说话，否则他从不开口。

en: He looked absorbed in reading the article.
zh: 他专心致志地读着那篇文章。

en: He was beside himself with joy.
He was absorbed in reading.
He is a boy with many dreams.
zh: 他是一个有很多梦想的男孩。

en: He is nothing more than a dreamer.
He looked for a place in which to sleep.
I fell asleep.
While sleeping, he snored loudly.
zh: 他睡觉的时候，鼾声如雷。

en: He will be sleeping.
He's probably sleeping.
He pretended to be sleeping.
He is asleep.
He's asleep.
His eyes were heavy with sleep.
He was bidding for popular support.
zh: 他正在争取民众的支持。

en: He adheres to the Democratic party.
He supports the Democratic Party.
He entered the Democratic Party but soon left it.
zh: 他加入了民主党，但很快就离开了。

en: He stands for democracy.
He died a soldier's death in the battle in the cause of democracy.
zh: 他为了民主事业在战斗中壮烈牺牲。

en: He looked at me with a strange expression.
zh: 他用一种奇怪的表情看着我。

en: His pulse beats slow.
He has a secret desire to play.
zh: 他有一个想玩的秘密愿望。

en: He entered the garden secretly.
He travels about the world gathering facts about little known countries.
zh: 他周游世界，收集关于鲜为人知的国家的事实。

en: He is quite a character.
He was absorbed in a manga.
He is absorbed in his manga magazine.
zh: 他专心致志地看他的漫画杂志。

en: He does nothing but read comics.
zh: 他除了看漫画什么也不做。

en: He chuckled at the comics.
He can't do without comics.
He was all smiles.
He got full marks.
He professed himself satisfied.
I understand him to be satisfied.
He lifted it up with all his might.
zh: 他使出全身力气把它举起来。

en: He is careless in everything.
He said that everything would turn out well.
zh: 他说一切都会好起来的。

en: He never saves money for a rainy day.
He will be remembered always.
He is the baby of the family.
He set out on his travels again.
He laid his head on the pillow.
He calls her up every night.
zh: 他每天晚上都给她打电话。

en: He skis in Hokkaido every winter.
zh: 他每年冬天都去北海道滑雪。

en: He goes to Karuizawa every year.
He plays baseball every day.
He goes abroad every year.
He goes overseas every year.
He never fails to write to his mother every day.
zh: 他每天都坚持给他的母亲写信。

en: He never fails to come to see me every day.
zh: 他每天都来看我，从不间断。

en: He made a point of reading ten pages every day.
He makes it a rule to work in the garden for two hours every day.
zh: 他规定自己每天在花园里工作两个小时。

en: He reads a novel every day.
He called me day after day.
He said that he takes a walk every day.
He makes it a rule to take a walk every morning.
zh: 他规定自己每天早上都要散步。

en: He carries his umbrella about with him every day.
He likes to spend some time in solitude every day.
zh: 他喜欢每天都有一段独处的时间。

en: He runs in the park every day.
He has to have his blood pressure taken every day.
He used to eat out every day, but now he can't afford it.
zh: 他过去每天都在外面吃饭，但现在他负担不起了。

en: He practiced every day at home.
He makes it a rule to read aloud every day.
zh: 他规定自己每天都要朗读。

en: He runs to the station every morning.
zh: 他每天早上都跑到车站。

en: Does he study English every day?
He goes swimming in the river every day.
He always makes it a rule to take an hour's walk every day.
zh: 他总是规定自己每天散步一个小时。

en: He drinks a lot of milk every day.
He seems to be oppressed by his monotonous daily life.
zh: 他似乎被单调的日常生活压迫着。

en: He consumed much of each day in idle speculation.
zh: 他每天的大部分时间都消耗在无聊的猜测上。

en: He called me up almost every day.
zh: 他几乎每天都给我打电话。

en: Does he watch television every day?
He watches TV every day.
He plays tennis every day.
He goes there every day.
He has his trousers pressed every day.
He is loafing every day.
He doesn't come here every day.
He does not come here every day.
He tests engines every day.
He does an engine test every day.
zh: 他每天都做一个引擎测试。

en: He drinks a glass of water every morning.
zh: 他每天早上都喝一杯水。

en: He studied for one and a half hours every day.
zh: 他每天学习一个半小时。

en: He makes it a rule to keep a diary every day.
zh: 他规定自己每天都写日记。

en: He makes it a rule to write in his diary every day.
zh: 他规定自己每天都写日记。

en: He made up his mind to keep a diary every day.
zh: 他下定决心每天都写日记。

en: He decided to write in his diary every day.
He made a resolution to write in his diary every day.
zh: 他下决心每天都写日记。

en: He made up his mind to write in his diary every day.
zh: 他下定决心每天都写日记。

en: He makes it a rule to get up at six every day.
zh: 他规定自己每天六点起床。

en: He has a bath every morning.
He takes a bath every morning.
He shaves with an electric razor every morning.
zh: 他每天早上都用电动剃须刀刮胡子。

en: He would sooner die than get up early every morning.
zh: 他宁愿死也不愿每天早上早起。

en: He gets up as early as five every morning.
zh: 他每天早上五点就起床。

en: He has a walk every morning.
He takes a walk every morning.
He said that he takes a walk every morning.
zh: 他说他每天早上都散步。

en: He said that he takes a walk in the park every morning.
zh: 他说他每天早上都在公园散步。

en: He walks in the park every morning.
zh: 他每天早上都在公园散步。

en: He went for a swim in the lake every morning.
zh: 他每天早上都去湖里游泳。

en: He walks his dog every morning.
He never misses reading the papers every day.
He makes it a rule to get up at six every morning.
zh: 他规定自己每天早上六点起床。

en: He said that he gets up at 6 o'clock every day.
zh: 他说他每天早上六点起床。

en: He was in the habit of taking a walk before breakfast.
He was in the habit of taking a walk before breakfast every morning.
zh: 他习惯于每天早上早餐前散步。

en: He reads the paper every morning.
He never fails to write to his mother every week.
zh: 他每周都坚持给他的母亲写信。

en: He never fails to write to her every week.
zh: 他每周都坚持给她写信。

en: He put aside a few dollars each week.
He washes the car every week.
He laid aside a few dollars each week.
He washes the bike every week.
He reads as many as twenty books every week.
zh: 他每周读多达二十本书。

en: He puts ten dollars aside every week.
He never fails to write to his mother every month.
zh: 他每月都坚持给他的母亲写信。

en: He puts aside a little money each month.
He puts aside some money every month.
How much money does he make a month?
He earns half a million yen a month.
zh: 他一个月挣五十万日元。

en: He gave his blood to help his sister.
zh: 他献血是为了帮助他的妹妹。

en: He took his sister along.
zh: 他带了他的妹妹一起去。

en: He will make my sister a good husband.
zh: 他会成为我妹妹的好丈夫。

en: He grabbed the chocolate away from his sister.
zh: 他把巧克力从他妹妹那里抢走了。

en: He cut his sister a piece of bread.
zh: 他给妹妹切了一片面包。

en: He had his sister help him paint the wall of his room.
zh: 他让他妹妹帮他刷房间的墙。

en: He had his younger sister help him paint the wall of his room.
zh: 他让他妹妹帮他刷房间的墙。

en: He made his sister a nice pen tray.
zh: 他给妹妹做了一个漂亮的笔筒。

en: He made it for his sister.
He got a cold from his sister.
zh: 他被他妹妹传染了感冒。

en: He doesn't have a sister.
He lived in obscurity.
He was dropped from the team for using drugs.
zh: 他因为吸毒被球队除名了。

en: I hear he is good at mahjong.
He was put under anesthesia.
He hit an easy fly.
zh: 他打了一个很容易接的高飞球。

en: He rises above the rest of mankind.
He always stands aloof from the masses.
He is basically a nice man.
He is buying some wood so that he can make a bookcase.
zh: 他正在买木头，这样他就可以做一个书架。

en: He had really come to get gold.
He is a real gentleman.
He is every inch a gentleman.
He doesn't seem to know his real self.
zh: 他似乎不了解真正的自己。

en: He isn't really sad; he's only acting.
zh: 他不是真的伤心，他只是在演戏。

en: He is a very smart boy.
zh: 他是个非常聪明的男孩。

en: He's really in good shape.
He lent me the money quite willingly.
He is really a nitpicker.
zh: 他真是个吹毛求疵的人。

en: He is really dull to hardship.
zh: 他真是个吃不了苦的人。

en: He will be really pleased.
He'll really be happy, won't he?
zh: 他一定会很高兴，不是吗？

en: He does want to be a wrestler, but he is too thin.
zh: 他确实想当摔跤手，但他太瘦了。

en: He is a really good worker.
He plays dirty pool.
He is very clever indeed.
That's really what he ate.
He does know the fact.
He's quite a nice fellow but I don't like him.
zh: 他是个很好的人，但我不太喜欢他。

en: He is a nice person.
He's a good man.
Do you think he will really give up?
zh: 你认为他真的会放弃吗？

en: He put the books on the shelf out of order.
zh: 他把书架上的书弄乱了。

en: He has a large number of books on his bookshelf.
zh: 他的书架上有大量的书。

en: He got the book down from the shelf.
He got down the book from the shelf.
He handed down books from the shelf.
He has become expert in hiding his true feeling.
zh: 他已经擅长隐藏他的真实感受。

en: He was reluctant to reveal what he really meant.
zh: 他不愿透露他真正的意思。

en: He is by far the best baseball player at our school.
zh: 他绝对是我们学校最好的棒球运动员。

en: He started to study in earnest.
He began working in earnest.
He took the photos in earnest.
He doesn't mean it; he's just acting.
zh: 他不是真心的，他只是在演戏。

en: He showed what he meant.
He dropped in at the bookstore.
He is reading a book.
He approached the boy reading a book.
zh: 他走近了那个正在读书的男孩。

en: Is he reading a book?
He does little else than read books.
zh: 他除了读书，几乎什么都不做。

en: He stopped reading a book.
He likes to read books.
He likes reading books.
He goes to the library to read books.
He kept reading a book.
He will sit for hours reading books.
zh: 他会一连几个小时坐在那里读书。

en: He often sits for many hours reading books.
zh: 他经常一连几个小时坐在那里读书。

en: He read the book from cover to cover.
zh: 他从头到尾读完了那本书。

en: He wants to dispose of his books.
He stretched out his arm to take the book.
He got out a book and began to read it.
He has a book.
He stuck the book in his bag.
He left his books all around the house.
zh: 他把书到处乱放，房子里到处都是。

en: He put aside the book.
He seldom, if ever, reads a book.
zh: 他很少读书，即使有，也很少。

en: He tore the book apart.
He left the book on the table.
Does he have many books?
He ordered the book from the publisher in the United States.
zh: 他从美国的出版社订购了这本书。

en: He ordered a book from a publisher in the United States.
zh: 他从美国的一家出版社订购了一本书。

en: He is what you might call a bookworm.
zh: 你可以说他是个书呆子。

en: He is badly off, because his book doesn't sell well.
zh: 他境况不佳，因为他的书卖得不好。

en: He coated the wall with paint.
He put the final coat of paint on the wall.
zh: 他在墙上涂了最后一层油漆。

en: He confessed his sins to the pastor.
zh: 他向牧师忏悔了他的罪过。

en: He is studying to be a minister.
zh: 他正在学习成为一名牧师。

en: He came to see me any time he felt like it.
zh: 他想什么时候来看我就什么时候来。

en: He came all the way from Nikko to see me off.
zh: 他特地从日光赶来为我送行。

en: He called me Ichiro.
He made me out to be a liar.
zh: 他把我描绘成一个骗子。

en: He has fewer friends than I.
He is much taller than I am.
He is senior to me by two years.
He's two years older than me.
He's two years older than I am.
He is older than I by two years, but less tall than I.
zh: 他比我大两岁，但是没有我高。

en: He's two years older than me, but he's shorter.
zh: 他比我大两岁，但他比较矮。

en: He's two years older than I am, but he's shorter than I am.
zh: 他比我大两岁，但他比我矮。

en: He cannot see the matter from my point of view.
zh: 他无法从我的角度看待这件事。

en: He looked back at me and grinned.
zh: 他回头看着我，咧嘴一笑。

en: He hit me on the head.
He reluctantly agreed to my proposal.
zh: 他不情愿地同意了我的提议。

en: He disregarded my advice.
He cares little for my advice.
He was deaf to my pleas.
zh: 他对我的恳求置若罔闻。

en: He is my close friend.
He's a close friend of mine.
He affected not to hear me.
He pretended not to hear me.
He patted me on the shoulder.
As soon as he saw me, he ran away.
He dealt me a blow in the face.
He struck me a heavy blow in the face.
zh: 他狠狠地朝我脸上打了一拳。

en: He robbed me of my bag.
He sent me a letter of appreciation.
He cautioned me against being careless of my health.
zh: 他告诫我不要对自己的健康掉以轻心。

en: He showed me her picture.
He secretly showed me her picture.
zh: 他偷偷地给我看了她的照片。

en: He secretly showed me her photo.
zh: 他偷偷地给我看了她的照片。

en: He secretly showed me her photograph.
zh: 他偷偷地给我看了她的照片。

en: He pressed me for a prompt reply.
He leveled his gun at me.
He asked me if I wanted to go abroad.
I felt as if he shrank from meeting me.
zh: 我感觉他好像在躲着我。

en: I'm sure he is keeping something from me.
zh: 我肯定他有什么事瞒着我。

en: He appointed me to do this task.
He explained how to play the guitar to me.
zh: 他向我解释了如何弹吉他。

en: He introduced me to a pretty girl.
zh: 他把我介绍给了一个漂亮的女孩。

en: He objected to our plan.
He belongs to our tennis team.
He's holding the real story back from us.
He gave us a detailed account of his experiences in Africa.
zh: 他详细地向我们讲述了他在非洲的经历。

en: He was angry that I had insulted him.
He helped me do my homework.
He never takes into account the fact that I am very busy.
zh: 他从来不考虑我很忙这个事实。

en: He bet me twenty dollars that I wouldn't do it.
zh: 他和我打赌二十美元，我不会做这件事。

en: He sprang from one of the best families in the north.
zh: 他出身于北方最好的家族之一。

en: He left on an expedition to the North Pole.
He is not from Hokkaido.
He postponed leaving for Hokkaido until next month.
zh: 他把去北海道的行程推迟到下个月了。

en: He has been to Hokkaido.
He went skiing in Hokkaido.
He has gone to Hokkaido.
He has been in Hokkaido before.
He gave the barking dog a vicious kick.
zh: 他狠狠地踢了那条吠叫的狗一脚。

en: He made his fortune from commerce.
He is a man with enterprise.
zh: 他是一个有事业心的人。

en: He was full of adventure.
He is fond of adventure.
He felt the lure of adventure.
zh: 他感受到了冒险的诱惑。

en: He likes adventure.
He was engaged in making a telescope.
zh: 他正在制造一架望远镜。

en: He adjusted the telescope to his sight.
zh: 他调整望远镜以适应他的视力。

en: He looked at the ship through his telescope.
zh: 他用望远镜观察那艘船。

en: He put his eye to a telescope.
zh: 他把眼睛凑到望远镜上。

en: He achieved his desired goal.
zh: 他实现了他渴望的目标。

en: He attained his hopes.
He is capable of deceiving others to get what he wants.
zh: 他有能力欺骗别人来得到他想要的东西。

en: He will not abandon all hope.
He gave up hope.
He abandoned hope.
He was compelled to resort to violence.
He was charged with assault and battery.
He was charged with the crime of abusive language.
He's too busy.
He was busy, but he took the time to show me around the city.
zh: 他很忙，但他还是抽出时间带我参观了这座城市。

en: He was busy.
He lived a busy life.
He doesn't see his family in his busy life.
zh: 在他忙碌的生活中，他很少见到家人。

en: Living a busy life, he usually doesn't see his family.
zh: 由于生活忙碌，他通常见不到家人。

en: He is a busy man, so you can only get in touch with him by telephone.
zh: 他是个大忙人，所以你只能通过电话联系他。

en: In as much as he is busy, he can't meet you.
zh: 因为他很忙，所以他不能见你。

en: Since he's busy, he can't meet you.
zh: 因为他很忙，所以他不能见你。

en: He's busy, so he can't meet you.
zh: 他很忙，所以他不能见你。

en: I thought he was busy, but on the contrary he was idle.
zh: 我以为他很忙，但恰恰相反，他很闲。

en: He said he was busy.
Is he busy?
He declined my request, saying that he was busy.
zh: 他以忙为由拒绝了我的请求。

en: He is wandering around in a trance.
zh: 他恍恍惚惚地四处游荡。

en: He wrote down my phone number in case he should forget it.
zh: 他写下了我的电话号码，以防忘记。

en: He was becoming forgetful, which bothered him a lot.
zh: 他越来越健忘了，这让他很苦恼。

en: He is apt to forget.
He put a cap on his head.
He took off his hat.
He picked up a hat and put it on to see how it would look.
zh: 他拿起一顶帽子戴上，看看效果如何。

en: He went back to get his hat.
He took off his hat and made a polite bow.
zh: 他摘下帽子，鞠了一个礼貌的躬。

en: He wore his hat askew.
He acknowledged me by raising his hat.
He thumped his hat flat.
He entered the room with his hat off.
He ran into the room with his hat and overcoat on.
zh: 他戴着帽子，穿着大衣跑进房间。

en: He went out without a hat.
He had no hat on.
He has a hat on.
He stood there with his hat on.
He kept his hat on.
He brushed his hat.
He was rich in experiences.
Whenever he calls on me, he leaves something behind.
zh: 每次他拜访我，都会留下一些东西。

en: He found the evidence that bees can communicate with each other.
zh: 他发现了蜜蜂可以互相交流的证据。

en: He had worked for the law firm for six years.
zh: 他在这家律师事务所工作了六年。

en: He was no match for a lawyer.
zh: 他根本不是律师的对手。

en: He was trained as a lawyer.
He made law his life career.
zh: 他把法律作为毕生事业。

en: He has a disregard for the law.
He wanted to follow law as a career.
He was caught in the clutches of the law.
He keeps to the letter of the law.
He was summoned to appear in court.
He got a master's degree in law.
zh: 他获得了法律硕士学位。

en: He is an undergraduate in the law department.
He was accused of having violated the law.
He broke the law.
He pointed out how important it is to observe the law.
zh: 他指出了遵守法律的重要性。

en: He has no sense of direction.
He lost his job through his irresponsibility.
zh: 他因不负责任而失去了工作。

en: He had an absent look on his face.
zh: 他脸上带着茫然的表情。

en: He was expelled from school.
He played baseball after school.
He was accused of stealing the jewels.
He is alleged to have stolen the jewelry.
He has a sharp eye for jewels.
He was given a gold watch as a reward.
zh: 他被授予金表作为奖励。

en: He had his secretary type the report.
zh: 他让他的秘书打印了报告。

en: He wrote the report.
He was busy collecting stuff for his report.
zh: 他正忙着为他的报告收集资料。

en: He is busy typing the reports.
He skimmed through the report.
He was shocked into silence.
He held a package under his arm.
He became famous thanks to his mother.
zh: 他因为他的母亲而出名。

en: He rejoiced at his mother's arrival.
zh: 他为他母亲的到来而欢欣鼓舞。

en: He did nothing but weep when he heard of his mother's death.
zh: 当他听到他母亲去世的消息时，他除了哭什么也没做。

en: He is anxious about his mother's health.
zh: 他很担心他母亲的健康。

en: He showed his mother around the city.
zh: 他带着他的母亲参观了这座城市。

en: He writes letters to his mother.
He was scolded by his mother.
He resembles his mother.
He looks like his mother.
He was as good a pianist as his mother.
zh: 他和他母亲一样是个优秀的钢琴家。

en: He received a telegram saying that his mother had died.
zh: 他收到一封电报，说他的母亲去世了。

en: He was exiled from his country.
zh: 他被流放出了他的国家。

en: He never fails to call his mother on her birthday.
zh: 他总是在他母亲生日的时候打电话给她。

en: He flouted his mother's advice.
zh: 他无视了他母亲的建议。

en: His mother is worried about him.
He was no better than a motherless child.
zh: 他和没娘的孩子没什么两样。

en: He was in a hurry to see his mother.
He has to support his mother and his sister.
zh: 他必须赡养他的母亲和他的妹妹。

en: He longed for his mother.
He is as smart as any other boy in the class.
zh: 他和班里其他任何男孩一样聪明。

en: He is well off.
He's a quick walker.
He's a fast walker.
He walks fast.
He will walk.
He whistled as he went along.
He whistled as he walked.
He goes to school on foot.
He walks to school.
He walked through the forest.
Does he go to school on foot or by bicycle?
zh: 他是步行去学校还是骑自行车去？

en: He was held in captivity.
He is in chains.
He has remained pro-conservative throughout.
zh: 他一直保持亲保守派的立场。

en: He is conservative to a degree.
He is an executive in an insurance company.
zh: 他是一家保险公司的高管。

en: He received a large sum in insurance benefit.
zh: 他收到了一大笔保险金。

en: He took a job with an insurance company.
zh: 他在一家保险公司找到了一份工作。

en: He has a lunch.
He trusted his defense attorney.
He is qualified to be a lawyer.
He let on that he was a lawyer.
He pretended that he was a lawyer.
He decided to be a lawyer.
He clung to the hope that he could be a lawyer.
zh: 他紧抱着希望，希望自己能当律师。

en: He should have been a lawyer.
He studied day and night with a view to becoming a lawyer.
zh: 他为了当律师，日夜苦读。

en: He studied day and night so that he might become a lawyer.
zh: 他日夜苦读，为了能成为一名律师。

en: He is studying hard so that he may become a lawyer.
zh: 他正在努力学习，以便将来能成为一名律师。

en: He decided to trust the lawyer with the document.
zh: 他决定把这份文件交给律师。

en: He is capable as a lawyer.
He is no good as a lawyer.
I don't believe he is a lawyer.
I believe he is not a lawyer.
I don't believe he's a lawyer.
He is a lawyer and must be treated as such.
zh: 他是一名律师，必须以律师的身份对待他。

en: He is diligent in his studies.
He is doing his work.
He's now studying.
He's studying.
He's studying now.
While he was studying, he fell asleep.
I found him at his books.
He is lazy in his study.
Why should he feel drowsy whenever he begins to study?
zh: 为什么他一学习就犯困呢？

en: Why does he become drowsy whenever he begins to study?
zh: 为什么他一学习就犯困呢？

en: He wanted to make the most of his chance to learn.
zh: 他想充分利用学习的机会。

en: He is diligent in his study.
He was too intent on studying to hear my call.
zh: 他太专注于学习，以至于没听到我的叫喊。

en: He applied himself to his study.
He concentrated on his studies.
He likes sports as well as study.
zh: 他既喜欢运动，也喜欢学习。

en: He failed in the examination because he had not studied.
zh: 他考试不及格是因为他没有学习。

en: He failed the exam because he didn't study.
zh: 他考试不及格是因为他没学习。

en: He's coming along nicely with his studies.
He looked upon any time not spent in study as so much lost time.
zh: 他认为所有没有用于学习的时间都是浪费。

en: He is the man you can rely on.
zh: 他就是你可以依靠的人。

en: He's a man you can rely on.
zh: 他是个你可以依靠的人。

en: He was at a loss for an answer.
zh: 他一时语塞，不知如何回答。

en: He was declared insolvent.
He looked around, but he saw no one.
zh: 他环顾四周，但没看见任何人。

en: He is blind in one eye.
He ducked down on one knee.
He walked with a limp.
He stood up with his hat in his hand.
zh: 他手里拿着帽子站了起来。

en: He carries fire in one hand and water in the other.
zh: 他一手拿火，一手拿水。（比喻两面派）

en: He held the wheel with one hand and waved to me with the other.
zh: 他一手扶着方向盘，另一只手向我挥手。

en: He has changed.
He had a strange dream.
He had an odd look on his face.
He took his leave and set out in the dark.
zh: 他告辞后，在黑暗中出发了。

en: She committed her baby to her divorced husband.
zh: 她把孩子托付给了离婚的丈夫。

en: She entrusted her baby to her divorced husband.
zh: 她把孩子托付给了离婚的丈夫。

en: I hear he's just begun looking for another job.
zh: 我听说他刚开始找另一份工作。

en: He painted all the walls green.
zh: 他把所有的墙都漆成了绿色。

en: He drew a straight line on the wall.
zh: 他在墙上画了一条直线。

en: He filled up the hole in the wall.
He fixed the bookshelf to the wall.
zh: 他把书架固定在墙上了。

en: He pressed his ear against the wall.
He leaned against the wall.
He was leaning against the wall.
He stood on one leg, leaning against the wall.
He is at home in American literature.
He must be an American.
He acquired American citizenship.
He wanted to see his boss in Tokyo before leaving for America.
zh: 他想在去美国之前在东京见他的老板。

en: He grows rice.
He is planning on inviting a lot of guests to the closing ceremony.
zh: 他计划邀请很多客人参加闭幕式。

en: He is good, not to say exceptional.
zh: 他很好，甚至可以说是非常出色。

en: He has an extraordinary faculty for mathematics.
He is a cut above the average college student.
zh: 他比一般的大学生要优秀得多。

en: He is above the ordinary type of student.
zh: 他超越了普通学生的水平。

en: He is a boy of singular intelligence.
zh: 他是一个非常聪明的男孩。

en: He worked hard to promote peace.
He tried to bring about peace.
He emphasized the importance of peace.
zh: 他强调了和平的重要性。

en: He dedicated his life to peace.
He sank the deal without batting an eyelash.
zh: 他毫不犹豫地破坏了这笔交易。

en: He looked calm, but actually he was very nervous.
zh: 他看起来很冷静，但实际上他非常紧张。

en: He lost his balance and fell off the ladder.
zh: 他失去平衡，从梯子上掉了下来。

en: He was a man of average height.
zh: 他是一个中等身高的人。

en: He walks seven miles a day on an average.
No scruple held him back from making this attempt.
zh: 没有任何顾忌阻止他做出这次尝试。

en: He escaped from prison by climbing over a wall.
He has no scruples about lying.
He climbed over the fence.
He threw a ball over the fence.
He placed the ladder against the fence.
He was subjected to strict military discipline while in the service.
zh: 服役期间，他受到了严格的军事纪律约束。

en: When he was in the military, he conformed to the strict army rules.
zh: 当他在军队时，他遵守严格的军队规则。

en: He is exempt from the military service.
He went to China as a soldier, never to come back.
zh: 他作为一名士兵去了中国，再也没有回来。

en: He yelled out an order to the soldiers.
zh: 他向士兵们大声喊出一个命令。

en: He is a professor of economics at Hyogo University.
zh: 他是兵库大学的经济学教授。

en: He got out of the trouble by making believe that he couldn't hear.
zh: 他装作听不见，从而摆脱了困境。

en: He is a good listener but a poor speaker.
He walked on tiptoe lest he be heard.
zh: 他踮起脚走路，以免被人听见。

en: He pretended not to be listening.
He is no better than a beggar.
zh: 他和一个乞丐没什么两样。

en: He proved to be a good writer.
zh: 他被证明是一个优秀的作家。

en: He is a good writer.
He is literally stupid.
He is a real fool.
He is altogether a giant.
He is reading a book of literary criticism.
zh: 他正在读一本文学评论的书。

en: He is a man of letters.
He went to Italy with a view to studying literature.
zh: 他去意大利是为了学习文学。

en: He learned to appreciate literature.
He devoted himself to the study of literature.
He treated himself to a new car.
zh: 他给自己买了一辆新车。

en: He has more sense than to say such a foolish thing.
zh: 他很明智，不会说出这么愚蠢的话。

en: He has attained to years of discretion.
He was a little old man with thick glasses.
zh: 他是一位戴着厚眼镜的小老头。

en: He is a physicist.
He is doing physics.
He is majoring in physics.
He had a book on physics published.
zh: 他出版了一本关于物理学的书。

en: He was trying to make an experiment in physics.
zh: 他试图做一个物理实验。

en: He understands physics.
He's a teacher of physics, but can also teach math.
zh: 他是一位物理老师，但也能教数学。

en: He is completely at home in physics.
He is second to none in physics.
zh: 他的物理学水平无人能及。

en: He came across some old documents in the closet.
zh: 他在壁橱里偶然发现了一些旧文件。

en: He was a quiet fellow and came from a good family.
zh: 他是个安静的人，出身于一个好家庭。

en: He tends to consider things too much earnestly.
zh: 他倾向于过于认真地考虑事情。

en: He's been taught to accept things as they are.
zh: 他从小就被教导要接受现实。

en: While he was lost in thought, he heard his name called.
zh: 当他陷入沉思时，他听到有人叫他的名字。

en: He is buried in thought.
He lives by begging.
He is slow to learn.
He is a man of understanding.
zh: 他是一个通情达理的人。

en: I account him to be a man of sense.
zh: 我认为他是个有头脑的人。

en: He carved a Buddhist image out of wood.
zh: 他用木头雕刻了一尊佛像。

en: He carved a Buddha statue from wood.
zh: 他用木头雕刻了一尊佛像。

en: He was converted from Buddhism to Christianity.
zh: 他从佛教改信了基督教。

en: He is good at solving complicated mathematical problems.
zh: 他擅长解决复杂的数学问题。

en: He devised a complicated clockwork toy.
zh: 他设计了一个复杂的发条玩具。

en: He pounded the table in a fit of anger.
He looked at her angrily.
He has a black heart.
He lost his temper and shouted at me.
zh: 他发脾气对我大喊大叫。

en: His apparent anger proved to be only a joke.
zh: 他表面上的愤怒原来只是个玩笑。

en: It appears to me that he is angry.
zh: 在我看来，他好像很生气。

en: He is a thoroughly dishonest character.
zh: 他是一个彻头彻尾的不诚实的人。

en: He told me that he was hungry.
He eats till he is full.
He once belonged to the Fukuda faction.
He works at the welfare office.
He despised those who lived on welfare.
zh: 他鄙视那些靠福利生活的人。

en: He is indifferent to what he wears.
zh: 他对穿什么衣服漠不关心。

en: He is careless about his clothes.
He is untidily dressed.
The tidiness of his clothes always impressed me.
zh: 他衣服的整洁总是给我留下深刻的印象。

en: He took off his clothes and put on his pajamas.
He gave his coat a brush.
He jumped into the water clothes and all.
zh: 他连衣服都没脱就跳进了水里。

en: He is a man of wide experience.
He gets his way by throwing his weight around.
He revenged himself.
He took revenge.
He was driven by revenge.
He took full advantage of the wrapper.
He took a hot bath and turned on the TV.
zh: 他洗了个热水澡，然后打开了电视。

en: He refrained from taking a bath.
He seems like he's got a few screws loose.
zh: 他看起来脑子有点问题。

en: Though he had a cold, he went to work.
zh: 虽然他感冒了，但他还是去上班了。

en: Even though he had a cold, he went to work.
zh: 即使他感冒了，他还是去上班了。

en: He had a cold, but he went to work.
zh: 他感冒了，但他还是去上班了。

en: He seems to have caught a cold.
He is apt to catch cold.
He catches colds easily.
I should say he has caught cold.
He is said to have a cold.
He gave up taking part in the marathon on account of his cold.
zh: 因为感冒，他放弃了参加马拉松。

en: He came down with a cold.
He caught a cold.
He was in bed with a cold.
He is suffering from a cold.
zh: 他正在遭受感冒的折磨。

en: He is under the care of the doctor with a cold.
zh: 他因感冒正在接受医生的治疗。

en: He never takes medicine for his cold.
He must have gotten over his cold.
He sat for a long time, listening to the sound of the wind.
zh: 他坐了很久，听着风的声音。

en: He ripped the envelope open.
He cut the envelope open.
He opened the envelope only to be disappointed.
zh: 他打开信封，结果却很失望。

en: He detected his men's misconduct.
zh: 他察觉到他的部下行为不端。

en: He damned his men right and left.
zh: 他把他的部下骂了个狗血淋头。

en: He has no authority over his staff members.
zh: 他对他的职员没有管辖权。

en: He is popular with his men.
He growled out orders to his subordinates.
zh: 他咆哮着向下属发出命令。

en: He led his men and horses over snowy mountains and down into hot valleys.
zh: 他率领人马翻过雪山，进入炎热的山谷。

en: He jumped about the room.
He walked in front of his men.
He made himself heard across the room.
zh: 他的声音传遍了整个房间。

en: He keeps his room clean.
He keeps the room to himself.
He ordered me to clean the room.
He put the room in order.
He put his room in order.
zh: 他把他的房间整理好了。

en: He looked around the room.
He shares a room.
zh: 他和别人合住一个房间。

en: He set things in order in his room.
zh: 他把房间里的东西整理好了。

en: He tidied up his room.
He walked up and down the room.
He kept walking up and down the room.
zh: 他不停地在房间里走来走去。

en: He walked back and forth in the room.
He stood up in the room and looked around.
zh: 他站起身，在房间里环顾四周。

en: He had to clean his room.
He hates cleaning his room.
He was seen to enter the room.
zh: 有人看见他进入了房间。

en: He spoke to whoever came into the room.
zh: 他和进入房间的任何人说话。

en: He came into the room.
He entered the room.
He ran into the room.
He forced his way into the room.
He said he did not enter the room, which was a lie.
zh: 他说他没有进入房间，那是谎话。

en: He complained about the room being too hot and humid.
zh: 他抱怨房间太热太潮湿。

en: He complained of the room being too small.
He complains of the room being so small.
He bolted out of the room.
He was made to go out of the room.
He came out of the room.
He went out of the room.
He left the room.
He carried the chairs out of the room.
He gave a ball.
He was left alone in the center of the stage.
zh: 他独自一人被留在舞台中央。

en: He is standing on the stage.
He died of a heart attack on the stage.
zh: 他在舞台上因心脏病发作去世。

en: He has made a fine comeback on the stage.
zh: 他在舞台上取得了漂亮的复出。

en: He acted on the stage.
He played "Hamlet" on the stage.
zh: 他在舞台上表演了《哈姆雷特》。

en: He was subjected to insult.
He got angry at being insulted.
zh: 他因为受到侮辱而生气。

en: In spite of being insulted, he managed to keep his temper.
zh: 尽管受到了侮辱，他还是设法控制住了自己的情绪。

en: He lay injured on the ground.
He pulled the wounded soldier to the nearby bush.
zh: 他把受伤的士兵拉到附近的灌木丛里。

en: He didn't acknowledge defeat.
He admitted himself defeated.
He admitted his defeat.
He took his defeat hard.
He takes after his father.
He looks like my father.
He is in constant dread of his father.
He is more human in thinking than his father.
zh: 他的想法比他父亲更有人情味。

en: He followed in his father's footsteps.
zh: 他追随了他父亲的脚步。

en: He was named Robert after his father.
zh: 他以他父亲的名字命名为罗伯特。

en: He is concerned about his father's illness.
zh: 他很关心他父亲的病情。

en: He was the instrument of his father's crimes.
zh: 他是他父亲犯罪的工具。

en: He ignored his father's advice.
zh: 他无视了他父亲的建议。

en: He succeeded to his father's large property.
zh: 他继承了他父亲的大笔财产。

en: He substituted for his father.
He was substituted for his father.
He can't say anything to his father's face.
zh: 他不敢当着他父亲的面说什么。

en: He must succeed to his father's business.
zh: 他必须继承他父亲的生意。

en: He went not to help his father but to borrow money from him.
zh: 他去不是为了帮助他的父亲，而是为了向他借钱。

en: He took charge of the family business after his father died.
zh: 他父亲去世后，他接管了家族企业。

en: He got over the shock of his father's death.
zh: 他从父亲去世的打击中走了出来。

en: He took over his father's business.
zh: 他接管了他父亲的生意。

en: He took over the business from his father.
zh: 他从他父亲那里接管了生意。

en: He never takes any notice of what his father says.
zh: 他从不注意他父亲说的话。

en: He never listens to what his father says.
zh: 他从不听他父亲说的话。

en: He acquiesced in his father's decision.
zh: 他默许了他父亲的决定。

en: He has taken charge of his father's company.
zh: 他已经接管了他父亲的公司。

en: He went abroad soon after his father.
zh: 他父亲去世后不久，他就出国了。

en: He got the job by virtue of his father's connections.
zh: 他靠着他父亲的关系得到了这份工作。

en: He played the guitar very well in his father's presence.
zh: 在他父亲面前，他吉他弹得非常好。

en: He avenged his father.
He is no less clever than his father is.
He resembles his father very much.
He was impertinent to his father.
zh: 他对他的父亲很不礼貌。

en: He is the very image of his father.
zh: 他简直是他父亲的翻版。

en: He begged his father to buy him a bicycle.
zh: 他恳求他父亲给他买一辆自行车。

en: I think he takes after his father.
zh: 我认为他很像他的父亲。

en: Do you think he resembles his father?
zh: 你认为他像他的父亲吗？

en: He has never been scolded by his father.
zh: 他从未被他的父亲责骂过。

en: He is not less clever than his father is.
He is not equal to his father.
He closely resembles his father.
Everyone says that he is the very image of his father.
zh: 每个人都说他简直是他父亲的翻版。

en: Everyone says that he looks just like his father.
zh: 每个人都说他看起来和他父亲一模一样。

en: He did business in the same manner as his father did.
zh: 他做生意的方式和他父亲一样。

en: He can ski as skillfully as his father.
zh: 他滑雪滑得和他父亲一样熟练。

en: He can ski as skilfully as his father.
zh: 他滑雪滑得和他父亲一样熟练。

en: He has as many books as his father does.
zh: 他的书和他父亲一样多。

en: He couldn't make good on a promise he had made to his father.
zh: 他无法兑现他对父亲的承诺。

en: He couldn't fulfill a promise he had made to his father.
zh: 他无法兑现他对父亲的承诺。

en: He is ashamed of his father being poor.
zh: 他为他父亲贫穷而感到羞愧。

en: He said his father was ill, which was a lie.
zh: 他说他父亲病了，那是谎言。

en: He found his father lying in the kitchen.
zh: 他发现他父亲躺在厨房里。

en: He is proud of his father being rich.
zh: 他为他父亲富有而感到自豪。

en: He has lost the watch given by his father.
zh: 他弄丢了他父亲给他的手表。

en: He felt sad because he lost his father.
zh: 他因为失去了父亲而感到悲伤。

en: He is afraid of his father.
He respects his father.
He has a hatred for his father.
He found it difficult to please his father.
zh: 他发现很难取悦他的父亲。

en: He is far taller than his father is.
He helps out in his father's store.
zh: 他在他父亲的店里帮忙。

en: He has some share of his father's genius.
zh: 他继承了他父亲的一些天赋。

en: He is inclined to make light of his father's advice.
zh: 他倾向于轻视他父亲的建议。

en: He made little of his father's advice.
zh: 他不太重视他父亲的建议。

en: He went there instead of his father.
zh: 他代替他父亲去了那里。

en: He didn't help his father.
He keeps quiet so that he won't disturb his father.
zh: 他保持安静，以免打扰他的父亲。

en: He cared for his mother after his father died.
zh: 他父亲去世后，他照顾他的母亲。

en: He avenged his father's death.
He wants to take over his father's business.
zh: 他想接管他父亲的生意。

en: He avenged the murder of his father.
zh: 他为他父亲的谋杀案报了仇。

en: He went there as his father told him.
zh: 他是按照他父亲说的去的。

en: He gave up going abroad to study because of his father's sudden death.
zh: 因为父亲的突然去世，他放弃了出国留学的机会。

en: He will live up to his father's expectations.
zh: 他会不辜负他父亲的期望。

en: He is no less wise than his father.
He is not less clever than his father.
He finally talked his father into buying a new car.
zh: 他终于说服了他父亲买了一辆新车。

en: He asked his father to take him to the store.
He has just as many books as his father does.
zh: 他的书和他父亲一样多。

en: He disagreed with his father.
zh: 他不同意他父亲的观点。

en: He is the picture of his father.
zh: 他和他父亲长得一模一样。

en: He is not as tall as his father.
He was surprised his father had sold the farm.
zh: 他很惊讶他父亲卖掉了农场。

en: He is proud that his father was a great scientist.
zh: 他为他父亲是一位伟大的科学家而感到自豪。

en: He wasted that which he had received from his father.
zh: 他浪费了他从父亲那里继承来的东西。

en: He is under fire for his affair.
zh: 他因为婚外情而受到抨击。

en: He was cheating.
He can't even float let alone swim.
zh: 他连浮都浮不起来，更别说游泳了。

en: He looks gloomy.
He usually uses credit cards instead of cash.
zh: 他通常使用信用卡而不是现金。

en: He's just an ordinary man.
His strength is much greater than that of an ordinary man.
zh: 他的力量比普通人要大得多。

en: He is nothing but an ordinary man.
zh: 他只不过是一个普通人。

en: He's just an ordinary office worker.
zh: 他只是一个普通的上班族。

en: He has a large family.
He has three dependents to support.
zh: 他有三个受他供养的家属。

en: He's getting cold feet.
He is afraid to fly in an airplane.
He behaved like he was afraid.
He gave me a stern look.
He tried to accumulate wealth.
He heaped up a fortune.
He equates wealth with happiness.
He has accumulated wealth.
He was interested in only the pursuit of wealth.
zh: 他只对追求财富感兴趣。

en: He approached her in the disguise of a policewoman.
zh: 他伪装成女警察接近她。

en: He helped the lady into the car.
He was accompanied by his wife.
His wife had him wrapped around her little finger.
He was sitting on the quay.
He is not very good company.
zh: 他不是一个很好的陪伴对象。

en: He is hard to get along with.
He fell into bad company.
He died an unnatural death.
He neglected his health and now he's sick in bed.
zh: 他忽视了自己的健康，现在卧病在床。

en: He dwelt on an unpleasant subject for two hours.
zh: 他花了两个小时反复思考一个令人不快的话题。

en: He was crowned with eternal victory.
zh: 他被授予了永恒的胜利。

en: He got a shameful title.
zh: 他获得了一个可耻的头衔。

en: He finished his work without sleep or rest.
zh: 他不眠不休地完成了他的工作。

en: He is subject to insomnia.
He complains, and with reason.
He pouted with dissatisfaction.
He is an evil man.
He bargained with the house agent for a lower price.
zh: 他与房屋中介讨价还价，以求更低的价格。

en: He made over the estate to his children.
zh: 他把遗产转让给了他的孩子们。

en: As a result of his carelessness, he made a serious blunder.
zh: 由于他的粗心大意，他犯了一个严重的错误。

en: He made a mistake through carelessness.
zh: 他因粗心大意而犯了一个错误。

en: His carelessness cost him a broken leg.
zh: 他的粗心大意使他摔断了腿。

en: He was so careless as to take the wrong train.
zh: 他太粗心了，竟然坐错了火车。

en: He was careless enough to get on the wrong train.
zh: 他粗心大意地上了错误的火车。

en: He carelessly forgot the camera in the bus.
zh: 他粗心地把相机忘在了公共汽车上。

en: He carelessly forgot the camera on the bus.
zh: 他粗心地把相机忘在了公共汽车上。

en: He was careless as to leave the door open.
zh: 他粗心大意地忘记关门。

en: He was so careless as to leave the door open.
zh: 他太粗心了，竟然忘记关门。

en: He makes careless mistakes, and does so frequently.
He drove carelessly and had an accident.
zh: 他粗心驾驶，发生了事故。

en: He reproached me for carelessness.
He has a bad reputation of being dishonest.
He dedicated his life to fighting corruption.
He commented on his unsuccessful business negotiation.
zh: 他评论了他不成功的商业谈判。

en: He contracted an incurable disease.
zh: 他染上了一种不治之症。

en: He has an incurable disease.
He likes strange animals, things like snakes, for example.
zh: 他喜欢奇怪的动物，比如蛇之类的。

en: He is the last man to commit an irregularity.
zh: 他是一个绝对不会犯规的人。

en: He was in the depth of misery.
zh: 他正处于极度痛苦之中。

en: His misfortune gained him sympathy.
zh: 他的不幸遭遇赢得了人们的同情。

en: He had the misfortune to lose his son.
zh: 他不幸失去了他的儿子。

en: He lived an unhappy life.
He complained of having been treated unfairly.
zh: 他抱怨自己受到了不公平的待遇。

en: He complained that he was unfairly treated.
zh: 他抱怨他受到了不公平的待遇。

en: He seems to be all thumbs.
He used chopsticks in an awkward way.
zh: 他用筷子的方式很笨拙。

en: He had an unpleasant screechy voice.
He tried to banish his anxiety.
He felt uneasy.
His heart misgave him.
He felt ill at ease.
He looked around uneasily.
He shifted about uneasily in his chair.
zh: 他在椅子上不安地挪动着。

en: He filled the bottle with water.
He contributed much money to relieving the poor.
zh: 他捐了很多钱来救济穷人。

en: He thinks nothing of poverty.
zh: 他认为贫穷没什么大不了的。

en: He does not know what it is to be poor.
zh: 他不知道贫穷是什么滋味。

en: He knows quite well what it is like to be poor.
zh: 他很清楚贫穷是什么滋味。

en: He is man who I think has never known poverty.
zh: 我认为他是一个从未经历过贫穷的人。

en: He remained a poor man.
He is as poor as can be.
He passed the test in the face of poverty.
zh: 他在贫困中通过了考验。

en: He was in the grip of poverty.
He ascribes his poverty to bad luck.
zh: 他把他的贫困归咎于运气不好。

en: He doesn't know what it is to be poor.
zh: 他不知道贫穷是什么滋味。

en: He didn't like being poor.
He is poor but is too proud to ask for help.
zh: 他很穷，但又太骄傲而不愿寻求帮助。

en: He had no choice but to give up school because of poverty.
zh: 由于贫困，他别无选择，只能放弃学业。

en: He was happy, poor as he was.
He is poor, but honest.
He is poor, but he doesn't care about money.
He is poor, but he never complains.
He concealed his poverty from my eyes.
zh: 他向我隐瞒了他的贫困。

en: He is poor and could not buy a coat.
He was poor and couldn't buy a coat.
He was poor and lived in a small cabin.
zh: 他很穷，住在一个小木屋里。

en: He could not send his son to college because of poverty.
zh: 由于贫困，他无法送他的儿子上大学。

en: Poor as he was, he couldn't go to college.
zh: 尽管他很穷，他还是上不了大学。

en: He was poor, so he couldn't go to college.
zh: 他很穷，所以他上不了大学。

en: Though he was poor, he was nonetheless happy.
zh: 虽然他很穷，但他仍然很快乐。

en: Though he was poor, he was happy.
zh: 虽然他很穷，但他很快乐。

en: He was born of poor parents.
zh: 他出生于贫困的父母家庭。

en: He has done many things for poor people.
zh: 他为穷人做了很多事情。

en: He held out a helping hand to the poor.
zh: 他向穷人伸出了援助之手。

en: He was born so poor that he received hardly any school education.
zh: 他出生时非常贫穷，几乎没有接受过学校教育。

en: He was a poor musician.
zh: 他是一个贫穷的音乐家。

en: He is poor, it appears.
